00139       public:

00142          :m_iter(other.m_iter) {}
00143        explicit reactor_iterator(details::reactor_set::const_iterator const &i)
00144          :m_iter(i) {}
00145        ~reactor_iterator() {}
00146        
00147       private:
00148        friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
00149 
00150        void increment() {
00151          ++m_iter;
00152        }
00153        bool equal(reactor_iterator const &other) const {
00154          return m_iter==other.m_iter;
00155        }
00156        reactor_id dereference() const {
00157          return m_iter->get();
00158        }
